00056     ConditionVarNSPR()
00057     {
00058         mMutex = new MutexNSPR();
00059         mNative = PR_NewCondVar( (mMutex->getNative()) );
00060         if (mNative == NULL)
00061             throw SystemException("Condition Variable initialization failed");

00083         mNative = PR_NewCondVar( (mMutex->getNative()) );
00084         if (mNative == NULL)
00085             throw SystemException("Condition Variable initialization failed");
